galasavscode.config.galasa.version: Specify your built version of Galasa to keep up with latest developments during your testing
galasavscode.config.galasa.maven-local: Specify the absolute path towards your local Maven repository (/User/$$$/.m2/repository)
galasavscode.config.galasa.maven-remote: Specify the WEB URI pointing at your remote Maven repository (https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/)
galasavscode.config.galasa.path: Specify your galasa path where the RAS, CPS, DSS... are located. This folder should be in a hidden folder under your user with the name; .galasa
